title: Professional Experience
text:
As a Sales Engineer at EBANX, I:

Partner with Account Executives to provide technical expertise throughout the sales cycle
Conduct discovery sessions to understand customer requirements and pain points
Create and deliver tailored product demonstrations for prospects and customers
Design solution architecture that aligns with customer business objectives
Provide technical responses to RFPs and RFIs
Support implementation planning and customer onboarding





WIP

title: About Me
text:
I am a Sales Engineer with 2 years of experience bridging the gap between technical solutions and business value. I specialize in [your specific area of focus, e.g., cloud solutions, SaaS platforms, cybersecurity, etc.].
My technical background in the payments industry combined with my understanding of business objectives allows me to effectively translate complex technical concepts into tangible business benefits for customers.

title: About Me
text:
My Approach
I believe that successful technical sales requires:

Deep Understanding: Taking the time to truly understand customer challenges
Tailored Solutions: Designing solutions that specifically address those challenges
Clear Communication: Explaining technical concepts in business terms
Partnership Mindset: Working as a trusted advisor rather than just a vendor

title: About Me
text:

LinkedIn: Your Name

title: Gabriel Prado
text:
I’m a Sales Engineer with expertise in the Payments Industry. I help organizations identify technical solutions that address their business challenges.



Technical Sales: Translating complex technical concepts into business value
Product Demonstrations: Creating tailored demonstrations that showcase solutions to specific customer problems
Solution Architecture: Designing comprehensive technical solutions that meet customer requirements
Customer Relationship: Building and maintaining trust with technical stakeholders







Successfully helped the company to identify the root cause and propose solutions to the TurnOver problem



In a college project, we helped the company to identify threats and opportunities in the Brazilian North Region.


View my experience →
